name: Just Tanks
description:
Fight your way through procedurally generated, destructible terrain. Gain upgrades to improve yourself as the enemies become more numerous and more unfair. See how many floors you can descend!

This is a submission for the 3 day game jam Minijam 98: Simulation. Total work hours came to a little under 24 hours. The graphics and sound aren't the best as I was focused on gameplay and terrain generation.

Thoughts on final project (as part of the game jam):
Very happy with how the generation system and upgrade system came out. Just getting 12 unique items into the game within a jam is cool. Sadly I didn't get to more complex enemy placement in the generation code (enemies do not spawn outside of buildings right now) and I didn't get my exploding barrels in!

Also enemy variety (outside of turrets) and enemy movement would have been nice to add. And I needed more time for testing and tweaking the numbers (of enemy features, upgrades, etc.).

Music: Push of the STRONG ONE!!! by Centurian of War
